title: A discourse upon prodigious abstinence occasioned by the twelve moneths fasting of Martha Taylor, the famed Derbyshire damosell : proving that without any miracle, the texture of humane bodies may be so altered, that life may be long continued without the supplies of meat & drink : with an account of the heart, and how far it is interessed in the business of fermentation / by John Reynolds ...
author: Reynolds, John, of Kings-Norton.
publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nevill Simmons ... and for Dorman Newman ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
